member.name: DirectX.CreateDXGIFactory
member.summary: Creates a DXGI 1.0 factory that you can use to generate other DXGI objects.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object referenced by the ppFactory parameter.
Address of a pointer to an object.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the following DXGI_ERROR.

member.name: DirectX.CreateDXGIFactory1
member.summary: Creates a DXGI 1.1 factory that you can use to generate other DXGI objects.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object referenced by the ppFactory parameter.
Address of a pointer to an object.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR.
